text: “cng rảlụk k̄hṇa thī̀ phraxngkh̒ thrng h̄ı̂ mī kār ngīb h̄lạb khrxbngả phwk cêā d̂wy khwām plxdp̣hạy cāk phraxngkh̒ læa thrng h̄ı̂ n̂ảlng mā kæ̀ phwk cêā cāk fāk f̂ā pheụ̄̀x thrng chảra phwk cêā d̂wy n̂ả nận læa thrng h̄ı̂ h̄md pị cāk phwk cêā sụ̀ng khwām s̄omm k̄hxng chạy t̩xn læa pheụ̄̀x thī̀ ca thrng p̄hūk h̄ạwcı k̄hxng phwk cêā læa thrng h̄ı̂ thêā mạ̀nkhng d̂wy n̂ả nận”
